reviewText: This video covered the Chinese Opera very well.  I incorporated it with an Asian Accents class and did some actual face painting with the students.  Only downfall was the sub-titles.  It would have been great if it had an English narrator.

This CD was well presented.  It was full of details for theTraditional Painting, through a time period.
Students as well as anyone interested in knowledge, will enjoy this DVD.
I know I did.
